task.summary: Completed - Improved recommendation reply form - Reply to recommendation (update DB) -value change back to 0 -update status to: Approved / Rejected

Login form to update hidden scope in controller -using parent scope
-able to pass variable using rootScope replacing the need for cookie
-upon login pass to dashboard

Logout function.
-added dropdown menu to navigate to profile (incomplete) -signout option which links to logout controller
-logoutCtrl will reset rootScope user data that is shared among controller before redirecting to / index
